review: Found Fire stick device to be very easy to stall. Far simplier than Chromecast which I sent back for lack of compatibilty with my Verizon tablet.  I dont have Prime yet.  BUT can't get signed into my Netflix acct. Tried some of the suggestions found on the device support link but so far no luck.  There's several complaints listed under the review section about the upgrade app not working. So maybe this is the problem?  Any suggestions Amazon?  before I go back to my blue ray player and return this thing? Whole reason for getting the Stick was to get away from clutter of more devices around the TV and have more viewing options &hopefully; less buffering. IF we get signed into Netflix and everything works okay, I would rate this 5 stars.

review: I've had Amazon Fire TV for 4 days and its has frozen and glitched on me 8 times in less than a couple hours. At one point it completely froze and I couldn't use amazon until I unplugged everything and plugged it back in. Absolutely ridiculous. I'd rather pay over double the price for the Apple TV.If you want basics and don't mind low quality - by all means, this device is for you. If you like variety and good quality, don't bother. Pay more for a better experience.
